titles: The leaven of pharisaism and sadducism purged out a sermon preached before the Court of Aldermen and city of London at their Guild-hall Chappel on Sunday Decemb. 16, 1688 / by J. Goodman.
author: Goodman, John, 1625 or 6-1690.
publisher: Printed by S. Roycroft for Robert Clavel ...,
notes: Imperfect: print show-through, with some loss of print.
